alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Lucie and southeastern Indian River Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pointe West, or 8 miles southwest of Vero Beach South, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Vero Beach, Indian River Shores, Vero Beach South and Gifford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie
